name: computrabajo-cypress
description: Automatizaci√≥n de pruebas para Computrabajo con Cypress

scripts.test: cypress run && npm run report:allure && npm run report:open
scripts.test:headed: cypress run --headed && npm run report:allure && npm run report:open
scripts.test:chrome: cypress run --browser chrome && npm run report:allure && npm run report:open
scripts.test:headed:chrome: cypress run --headed --browser chrome && npm run report:allure && npm run report:open
scripts.test:debug: cypress run --inspect && npm run report:allure && npm run report:open
scripts.test:allure: cypress run && npm run report:allure && npm run report:open

author: Leslie Liseth Morales Casseres
